snippet: Sunday’s rally was an unusual choice for the Congress Party, author said.
abstract: Sunday’s rally was an unusual choice for the Congress Party, author said.
lead_paragraph: “On Sunday, thousands of people assembled in Delhi to have a good time as three earnest but ungifted orators talked about the benefits of ‘foreign direct investment’ and the other things,” Manu Joseph wrote in the Rendezvous blog, about the leaders of the Congress Party —Prime Minister Manmohan Singh, Sonia Gandhi and Rahul Gandhi.

headline.main: India’s Governing Party Shows Spine for a Change
